publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-4521 Patricia Ferguson: More New Homes from Queens Cross Housing Association—That the Parliament notes the progress made by Queens Cross Housing Association toward the construction of 140 new homes at Murano Street in Firhill in Glasgow, the first of which will be completed by the summer of 2011; welcomes this development, which will provide homes for rent and for shared equity, including new homes for Glasgow Housing Association tenants in Hamiltonhill whose existing homes are to be demolished; acknowledges the commitment of Queens Cross Housing Association, in partnership with Glasgow City Council, to the provision of social-rented housing and affordable home ownership for residents in north west Glasgow, and congratulates it on the start of this project, which is the first of a programme of 337 new homes in the area.

S3M-4521 Patricia Ferguson: More New Homes from Queens Cross Housing Association—That the Parliament notes the progress made by Queens Cross Housing Association toward the construction of 140 new homes at Murano Street in Firhill in Glasgow, the first of which will be completed by the summer of 2011; welcomes this development, which will provide homes for rent and for shared equity, including new homes for Glasgow Housing Association tenants in Hamiltonhill whose existing homes are to be demolished; acknowledges the commitment of Queens Cross Housing Association, in partnership with Glasgow City Council, to the provision of social rented housing and affordable home ownership for residents in north west Glasgow, and congratulates it on the start of this project, which is the first of a programme of 337 new homes in the area.
S3M-4521 More New Homes from Queens Cross Housing Association (lodged on 25 June 2009) Bob Doris*
S3M-4521 More New Homes from Queens Cross Housing Association (lodged on 25 June 2009) Mr Frank McAveety*
